Text: FW EnronGlobal Crossing NDA Cc Forwarded is the NDA with Global Crossing which is agreed for signature Tana could you please prepare and arrange for execution Call me if you need me to arrange a signature on the Net Works side Thanks Peter Feltman Original Message From Millner Hank lobalCrossingcomENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESMillnerCHankCHMillnerGlobalCrossingEco mE NRONcom Sent Friday April PM To Peter Feltman Email Cc OBrien Laureen Subject EnronGlobal Crossing NDA Peter Attached is an updated version of the EnronGlobal Crossing NDA that identifies the appropriate Global Crossing entity It has been cleared for signature by our inhouse counsel If Enron is also okay with the NDA please accept the changes and fax a signed copy to my attention for signature by Global Crossing My fax number is Feel free to give me a call with any questions or comments I look forward to meeting with you shortly Regards Hank EnronGlobal Crossing NDAdoc EnronGlobal Crossing NDAdoc

Enrons comments to the FLAGEnron NDA Cc Pursuant to your voice mail from last week attached please find Enrons comments to the NDA with respect to injunctive relief Please let me know if the provided language is sufficient per your inhouse counsel Best regards Peter Feltman Peter Feltman Director Enron Net Works Smith Street Houston Texas Telephone Cellular Facsimile EMail

FLAGEnron NDA Cc Attached is a marked version of the FLAGEnron which changes FLAG has agreed Please produce a clean version of the attached put it on Enron letterhead and provide to me so that I may arrange to have it signed by an appropriate officer of ENW Please call if you have any further questions or comments Thank you Peter Feltman Peter Feltman Director Enron Net Works Smith Street Houston Texas Telephone Cellular Facsimile EMail
EnronPure Markets Cc Once you have a fully executed NDA with Pure Markets could you please send a copy to Dovie Keprta Thanks Peter Feltman

Level Enron Net Works NDA Cc Pursuant to your conversation yesterday with Mathis Conner attached for your review and comment please find an initial draft of the NDA between Level and Enron Net Works Please call Leslie Hansen Enron inhouse counsel at if you have any questions or comments concerning the NDA Please call Mathis at or myself at if you need to discuss any additional matters further Best regards Peter Feltman Peter Feltman Director EMarket Services Enron Net Works LLC Smith Street Houston Texas T X C

RE NDA AW Technologies and Enron Net Works Enrons co Cc Wong Try this version I hope it works Best regards Peter Feltman Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESNIDLLCaolEcom NRONcom Sent Thursday February PM To Feltman Peter Cc Greenberg Mark Jones Tana Conner Mathis Subject Re NDA AW Technologies and Enron Net Works Enrons co I cannot read your file since it is in Word format Can you send it in word format or in Rich format I am interersted to read your comments Best regards Alfred Wong AW Technologies LLC

FLAG Enron NDA Enrons comments Cc Per my voice mail from yesterday evening attached for you and your counsels review and comment please find Enrons comments to your revision to the initial draft of the Non Disclosure Agreement Our comments reflect the following Section b has been modified to be inclusive of the Confidential Information and Section Enron requires that arbitration be a part of the NDA Please call Mark Greenberg Enron inhouse counsel at if you have any questions or comments to the attached Please call me at if you need to discuss any matters further Best regards Peter Feltman Peter Feltman Director Enron Net Works Smith Street Houston Texas T X EMail
EnronPure Markets Cc Once you have a fully executed NDA with Pure Markets could you please send a copy to Dovie Keprta Thanks Peter Feltman

Level Enron Net Works NDA Cc Pursuant to your conversation yesterday with Mathis Conner attached for your review and comment please find an initial draft of the NDA between Level and Enron Net Works Please call Leslie Hansen Enron inhouse counsel at if you have any questions or comments concerning the NDA Please call Mathis at or myself at if you need to discuss any additional matters further Best regards Peter Feltman Peter Feltman Director EMarket Services Enron Net Works LLC Smith Street Houston Texas T X C
